Features.Name: Improved Critical
Desc: Your weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

Features.Name: Remarkable Athlete
Desc: You can add PB_o2 to any Str, Dex, or Con check you make that doesn't already use your proficiency bonus.
when you make a running long jump, the distance you can cover increases by a number of feet equal to STR

Features.Name: Superior Critical
Desc: Your weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 18-20.

Features.Name: Survivor
Desc: At the start of each of your turns, you regain CON_5 hit points if you have no more than half of your hit points left. You don't gain this benefit if you have 0 hit points.
